title: Aeroelectrolyte for Atmospheric Open Electrochemical Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01252F, Communication
Yeji Lim, Yoon Jeong Yoo, Boran Kim, Suji Kim, Ga-Yoon Kim, Won-Hee Ryu
Expediting electrochemical reactions that involve gaseous components is crucial for the development of diverse energy and environmental applications (batteries, electrochemical conversion, fuel cells, and gas sensors). Unfortunately, the intrinsically closed...
